mainSequence.step: Actor requests to calibrate lens and laser
UI displays UI to select lens calibration RAWs
UI displays UI to select laser calibration RAWs
UI requests process and undistort RAWs
Backend provides undistorted and processed RAW bytes
UI displays UI to label laser dots
UI requests to store lens and laser calibration
Database reports lens and laser calibration saved successfully
UI reports success of laser and lens calibration
